original_text:
Deadwood
La banda di pistoleri è tornata per un secondo giro di bobine sulla slot di NoLimit City.  Il seguito di Tombstone vi porterà nella famigerata città di Deadwood, un covo di fuorilegge temute per le loro sfacciate rapine e le sparatorie selvagge. Unisciti ai tre cacciatori di taglie mentre inseguono il loro prossimo fuorilegge con la funzione degli xNudge Wilds e un caos di caratteristiche di Free Spins con moltiplicatori progressivi e altri modificatori che possono portare a vittorie fino a 13.950 volte la tua scommessa.
Siete pronti a resistere al caos e alla mancanza di leggi tra le bobine delle slot di Deadwood nel tentativo di incassare la ricompensa massima di 13.950 volte la vostra puntata? Goditi il ritmo frenetico del gioco del selvaggio west, le caratteristiche dei bonus multipli, gli stacked wilds e i moltiplicatori crescenti.
Una grafica da amanti del selvaggio West
La slot Deadwood è un gioco a 5 rulli, 576 modi per vincere, alimentato da Nolimit City. Disponibile per giocare su tutti i dispositivi a partire da 20 centesimi a rotazione, questa slot a tema Wild West è dotata di Hunter xNudge Wilds che espandono e aumentano il moltiplicatore ad ogni spinta. C’è una funzione Shoot Out dove i simboli a basso valore fungono da wilds. Poi ci sono 3 caratteristiche di giri liberi in cui si applicano le 2 caratteristiche di cui sopra. Nella funzione Shoot Out Free Spins, i distintivi dello sceriffo si bloccano in posizione per garantire i trigger della funzione Shoot Out. Il seguito dello slot Tombstone ha un RTP del 96,02% e una vincita massima di 13.950x la tua puntata.
Deadwood è una video slot in formato 3-4-4-4-3 con 576 modi di vincere. I pagamenti vengono assegnati per tre o cinque simboli corrispondenti su bobine adiacenti solo da sinistra a destra. È possibile unirsi ai pistoleri su desktop o mobile da 0,20 a 100 crediti per giro. Il gioco ha la massima volatilità (10/10) con una gamma RTP del 96,02 – 96,03%.
Caricando il gioco vi vedrete entrare nella Main Street della città del selvaggio west accanto ai vostri tre compagni pistoleri. Potreste fermarvi al saloon di Deadwood per un pasto sostanzioso che vi darà energia prima di andare a caccia con i fuorilegge. Un telaio di metallo tiene il set di bobine più grande che ora è alto tre e quattro file. Ognuno dei tre cacciatori di taglie comanda il proprio rullo, fornendo moltiplicatori crescenti mentre si muovono in piena vista.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
La Slot Deadwood ha un sacco di caratteristiche bonus. Avete la funzione Hunter xNudge Wild che vede il cacciatore di taglie selvaggio spingere per diventare completamente visibile e aumentare il moltiplicatore per ogni spinta. I distintivi dello sceriffo attivano anche la funzione Shoot Out, dove i simboli di basso valore diventano Wild. Poi ci sono 3 caratteristiche di rotazioni libere. Una di queste vede la funzione Hunter xNudge Wild innescare ad ogni giro libero con la funzione Gunslinger Spins vede il moltiplicatore aumentare all’infinito. La migliore è la funzione Shoot Out Free Spins dove i distintivi di sceriffo sono bloccati in modo che la funzione Shoot Out si applichi ad ogni giro libero.
Ci sono 3 cacciatori di taglie nella Slot Deadwood. Ti permettono di vincere fino a 4 Free Spins e compaiono su bobine 2, 3 e 4. Quando compaiono, devi sperare che continuino a capitare ad ogni Spin. Ad ogni comparsa di un cacciatore di taglie, infatti, il simbolo Wild aumenta a livello di moltiplicatore di 1x.
Se compaiono più moltiplicatori wild, essi vengono aggiunti l’uno all’altro per un moltiplicatore wild totale. I jolly sostituiscono tutti i simboli, tranne il simbolo della dispersione e il simbolo del distintivo.
Attenzione al simbolo del distintivo dello sceriffo. Quando il simbolo dello sceriffo appare su entrambi i rulli 1 e 5 nel gioco base, si attiva la funzione Shoot Out. Tutti i simboli di basso valore sulle 3 bobine centrali si trasformeranno in simboli jolly.
Il simbolo più importante è lo Scatter. 3 di essi che appaiono simultaneamente vi daranno la possibilità di scegliere tra 2 e 8 Free Spins.
Caratteristica Hunter Spins: con 8 rotazioni assegnate al cacciatore, almeno 1 Hunter wild è garantito per atterrare su ogni rotazione libera. Questo fa scattare la funzione Hunter xNudge Wild con moltiplicatori. I distintivi dello sceriffo possono anche atterrare con l’aggiunta di 1 giro in più rispetto a quelli che già possiedi.
Funzione Gunslinger Spins: con 8 giri di pistola assegnati, questa è un’opzione più volatile. Si sfidano i pistoleri a testa in giù e si cerca di vincere il moltiplicatore di vincita illimitato che rimane per l’intera funzione. Qualsiasi atterraggio con simbolo wild Hunter attiverà il moltiplicatore di vincita illimitato. Ogni atterraggio con il distintivo di sceriffo vi darà 1 giro gratis aggiuntivo ogni volta.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Booming Games ha messo a punto un serio slot a tema Wild West che porta il meglio delle caratteristiche di questo genere e fa poche cose in più per migliorare le possibilità di una grande vittoria.
Gunspinner ha una disposizione di tre file e cinque rulli. Finora niente di diverso dallo standard. I simboli ruotano su 20 linee di pagamento sempre attive e sono divisi in simboli dal valore alto e dal valore basso. C’è un simbolo jolly che può sostituire qualsiasi altro simbolo, tranne i simboli bonus. Oltre a questo, il jolly può anche portare moltiplicatori alle vincite.

raw_translation.response:
Deadwood is a slot game sequel to Tombstone, where players enter the infamous town of Deadwood, known for its daring robberies and wild shootouts. Join three bounty hunters as they chase after their next outlaw with xNudge Wilds and a host of Free Spins features, including progressive multipliers and other modifiers that can lead to wins up to 13,950 times your bet. 

Are you ready to brave the chaos and lawlessness of Deadwood's reels in pursuit of a whopping 13,950x your stake? This wild west-themed slot game offers a fast-paced gaming experience, with multiple bonus features, stacked wilds, and increasing multipliers. 

The game boasts graphic designs suited for fans of the wild west, with a 3-4-4-4-3 format and 576 ways to win. Players can engage with the game on desktop or mobile, betting with as little as 20 cents up to 100 credits per spin. Deadwood has maximum volatility (10/10) and an RTP range of 96.02-96.03%. 

As you load the game, you'll be transported to the Main Street of the wild west town alongside the three other gunslingers. You may even stop over at the Deadwood saloon for a hearty meal before going on a hunt for outlaws. The metal frame holds the reels, with each bounty hunter commanding their own reel to offer increasing multipliers with each visible spin.

Deadwood has plenty of bonus features, including the Hunter xNudge Wilds that expand and increase multipliers with every spin, and the Shoot Out, where low-value symbols become wilds. Players can also receive free spins, with the Gunslinger Spins feature seeing the multiplier increase infinitely. The Shoot Out Free Spins feature sees the sheriff badges locked in place, causing the Shoot Out feature to apply to every free spin. 

Players can win up to four free spins and must hope that the three bounty hunters appear on reels 2, 3, and 4, along with a 1x increase in Wild multipliers for each appearance. If more wild multipliers appear, their values are added together for a total wild multiplier. Jokers replace all symbols except the scatter symbol and badge. When the sheriff badge symbol appears on reels 1 and 5 in the base game, the Shoot Out feature is triggered, and low-value symbols on the three middle reels transform into wild symbols. 

The most important symbol is the scatter, with three scatters landing simultaneously awarding players the chance to choose between 2 and 8 free spins. The Hunter Spins feature guarantees at least one Hunter Wild to land on every free spin, which triggers the Hunter xNudge Wild feature with multipliers. The sheriff badges may also appear, awarding players with an additional free spin. 

The Gunslinger Spins feature is the most volatile, with players taking on the head-to-head challenge against the gunslingers to win the unlimited win multiplier. Any landing with the Hunter Wild symbol triggers the unlimited win multiplier, while a badge symbol landing awards an additional free spin.

If you're looking for a similar Wild West-themed slot game, Booming Games offers Gunspinner, with three rows, five reels, 20 paylines, and high and low-value symbols. The Joker symbol can replace any other symbol except the bonus symbols and also brings multipliers to wins.

raw_translation.response:
Deadwood
The notorious gang of gunslingers is back for a second round of spins on the NoLimit City slot. The sequel to Tombstone will take you to the infamous town of Deadwood, a den of feared outlaws known for their daring heists and wild shootouts. Join the three bounty hunters as they chase their next outlaw with the xNudge Wilds feature and a flurry of Free Spins features with progressive multipliers and other modifiers that can lead to wins up to 13,950 times your bet.

Are you ready to withstand the chaos and lawlessness between the Deadwood reels in an attempt to cash in on the maximum reward of 13,950 times your bet? Enjoy the fast-paced gameplay of the Wild West, the multiple bonus features, stacked wilds, and increasing multipliers.
 
Graphics for Wild West enthusiasts
 
The Deadwood slot is a 5-reel, 576 ways to win game, powered by Nolimit City. Available to play on all devices starting at 20 cents per spin, this Wild West themed slot features Hunter xNudge Wilds that expand and increase the multiplier on every spin. There is a Shoot Out feature where low-value symbols act as wilds. Then there are 3 Free Spins features where the 2 above-mentioned features apply. In the Shoot Out Free Spins feature, Sheriff badges lock in place to guarantee Shoot Out feature triggers. The Tombstone slot sequel has an RTP of 96.02% and a maximum win of 13,950x your bet.

Deadwood is a video slot in a 3-4-4-4-3 format with 576 ways to win. Payments are awarded for three or five matching symbols on adjacent reels only from left to right. You can join the gunslingers on desktop or mobile from 0.20 to 100 credits per spin. The game has the maximum volatility (10/10) with an RTP range of 96.02 - 96.03%.
 
As you load the game, you'll see yourself entering Main Street of the Wild West town alongside your three gunslingers companions. You might stop at the Deadwood saloon for a hearty meal that will give you energy before going hunting with the outlaws. A metal frame holds the bigger reel set that's now three and four rows tall. Each of the three bounty hunters commands their own reel, providing increasing multipliers as they move in full view.
 
Features and symbols of the Slot Machine
 
The Deadwood slot has plenty of bonus features. You have the Hunter xNudge Wild feature, which sees the wild bounty hunter push to become fully visible and increase the multiplier on each spin. Sheriff badges also trigger the Shoot Out feature, where low-value symbols turn into wilds. Then there are 3 Free Spins features. One of them sees the Hunter xNudge Wild feature trigger on every free spin. The Gunslinger Spins feature sees the multiplier increase infinitely. The best one is the Shoot Out Free Spins feature, where Sheriff badges are locked in place so that the Shoot Out feature applies on every Free Spin.

There are three bounty hunters in the Deadwood Slot. They allow you to win up to 4 Free Spins and appear on reels 2, 3, and 4. When they appear, you must hope they keep coming on every spin. With each appearance of a bounty hunter, the Wild multiplier increases by 1x. If multiple Wild multipliers appear, they are added together for a total Wild multiplier. Wilds substitute for all symbols except the Scatter and Sheriff badge symbols.
 
Beware of the Sheriff badge symbol. When the Sheriff badge symbol appears on both reels 1 and 5 in the base game, the Shoot Out feature is triggered. All low-value symbols on the 3 middle reels will turn into Wild symbols.

The most important symbol is the Scatter. 3 of them appearing simultaneously give you the chance to choose between 2 and 8 Free Spins.
 
Hunter Spins feature: with 8 spins awarded to the hunter, at least 1 Hunter Wild is guaranteed to land on every Free Spin. This triggers the Hunter xNudge Wild feature with multipliers. Sheriff badges can also land with the addition of 1 extra spin to what you already have.
 
Gunslinger Spins feature: with 8 gun spins awarded, this is a more volatile option. You challenge the gunslingers head-on and try to win the unlimited win multiplier that remains for the entire feature. Any landing with a Hunter Wild symbol triggers the unlimited win multiplier. Every landing with the Sheriff badge gives you 1 extra Free Spin every time.
 
Similar Slot Machines
 
Booming Games has developed a serious Wild West themed slot that brings the best of this genre's features and does a few more things to improve your chances of a big win.
 
Gunspinner has a layout of three rows and five reels. So far, nothing different from the standard. Symbols spin on 20 always-active paylines and are divided into high-value and low-value symbols. There is a Wild symbol that can replace any other symbol except bonus symbols. In addition to this, the Wild can also bring multipliers to your winnings.

Graphics for Wild West enthusiasts

You might stop at the Deadwood saloon for a hearty meal that will give you energy before going hunting with the outlaws. A metal frame holds the bigger reel set that's now three and four rows tall. Each of the three bounty hunters commands their own reel, providing increasing multipliers as they move in full view.
 
Features and symbols of the Slot Machine
 
The Deadwood slot has plenty of bonus features. You have the Hunter xNudge Wild feature, which sees the wild bounty hunter push to become fully visible and increase the multiplier on each spin. Sheriff badges also trigger the Shoot Out feature, where low-value symbols turn into wilds. Then there are 3 Free Spins features. One of them sees the Hunter xNudge Wild feature trigger on every free spin. The Gunslinger Spins feature sees the multiplier increase infinitely. The best one is the Shoot Out Free Spins feature, where Sheriff badges are locked in place so that the Shoot Out feature applies on every Free Spin.

There are three bounty hunters in the Deadwood Slot. They allow you to win up to 4 Free Spins and appear on reels 2, 3, and 4. When they appear, you must hope they keep coming on every spin. With each appearance of a bounty hunter, the Wild multiplier increases by 1x. If multiple Wild multipliers appear, they are added together for a total Wild multiplier. Wilds substitute for all symbols except the Scatter and Sheriff badge symbols.
 
Beware of the Sheriff badge symbol. When the Sheriff badge symbol appears on both reels 1 and 5 in the base game, the Shoot Out feature is triggered. All low-value symbols on the 3 middle reels will turn into Wild symbols.

The most important symbol is the Scatter. 3 of them appearing simultaneously give you the chance to choose between 2 and 8 Free Spins.
 
Hunter Spins feature: with 8 spins awarded to the hunter, at least 1 Hunter Wild is guaranteed to land on every Free Spin. This triggers the Hunter xNudge Wild feature with multipliers. Sheriff badges can also land with the addition of 1 extra spin to what you already have.
 
Gunslinger Spins feature: with 8 gun spins awarded, this is a more volatile option. You challenge the gunslingers head-on and try to win the unlimited win multiplier that remains for the entire feature. Any landing with a Hunter Wild symbol triggers the unlimited win multiplier. Every landing with the Sheriff badge gives you 1 extra Free Spin every time.

There is a Wild symbol that can replace any other symbol except bonus symbols. In addition to this, the Wild can also bring multipliers to your winnings.

Let's dive in and explore the gameplay features of Deadwood, the slot game that engages players in wild west adventure. With 5 reels and 576 ways to win, players can expect an exciting and rewarding gaming experience.

One of the most exciting features of Deadwood is the Hunter xNudge Wilds. These wilds can nudge to cover the entire reel and come with a 3x multiplier. Getting these wilds on the reels can be a real game changer, potentially leading to big wins.

Adding to the excitement is the Shoot Out feature where low-value symbols turn into wilds, leading to higher winnings. But wait, there's more! Deadwood also offers 3 Free Spins features, each with their own unique twist. During these free spins rounds, the Hunter xNudge Wilds and Shoot Out features remain active, increasing the opportunities for big wins.

But the fun doesn't stop there. In the Shoot Out Free Spins feature, Sheriff badges lock in place, guaranteeing the triggering of the Shoot Out feature. It's like having the bad guys in your own crosshairs, and you can be the hero of the town.

Overall, Deadwood offers a lot of fun, excitement, and opportunities to win big. So saddle up, partner, and get ready for the ride of your life!

The notorious gang of gunslingers is back for a second round of spins on the NoLimit City slot. The sequel to Tombstone will take you to the infamous town of Deadwood, a den of feared outlaws known for their daring heists and wild shootouts. Join the three bounty hunters as they chase their next outlaw with the xNudge Wilds feature and a flurry of Free Spins features with progressive multipliers and other modifiers that can lead to wins up to 13,950 times your bet.

Are you ready to withstand the chaos and lawlessness between the Deadwood reels in an attempt to cash in on the maximum reward of 13,950 times your bet? Enjoy the fast-paced gameplay of the Wild West, the multiple bonus features, stacked wilds, and increasing multipliers.
 
Graphics for Wild West enthusiasts
 
The Deadwood slot is a 5-reel, 576 ways to win game, powered by Nolimit City. Available to play on all devices starting at 20 cents per spin, this Wild West themed slot features Hunter xNudge Wilds that expand and increase the multiplier on every spin. There is a Shoot Out feature where low-value symbols act as wilds. Then there are 3 Free Spins features where the 2 above-mentioned features apply. In the Shoot Out Free Spins feature, Sheriff badges lock in place to guarantee Shoot Out feature triggers. The Tombstone slot sequel has an RTP of 96.02% and a maximum win of 13,950x your bet.

Deadwood is a video slot in a 3-4-4-4-3 format with 576 ways to win. Payments are awarded for three or five matching symbols on adjacent reels only from left to right. You can join the gunslingers on desktop or mobile from 0.20 to 100 credits per spin. The game has the maximum volatility (10/10) with an RTP range of 96.02 - 96.03%.
 
As you load the game, you'll see yourself entering Main Street of the Wild West town alongside your three gunslingers companions. You might stop at the Deadwood saloon for a hearty meal that will give you energy before going hunting with the outlaws. A metal frame holds the bigger reel set that's now three and four rows tall. Each of the three bounty hunters commands their own reel, providing increasing multipliers as they move in full view.
 
Features and symbols of the Slot Machine
 
The Deadwood slot has plenty of bonus features. You have the Hunter xNudge Wild feature, which sees the wild bounty hunter push to become fully visible and increase the multiplier on each spin. Sheriff badges also trigger the Shoot Out feature, where low-value symbols turn into wilds. Then there are 3 Free Spins features. One of them sees the Hunter xNudge Wild feature trigger on every free spin. The Gunslinger Spins feature sees the multiplier increase infinitely. The best one is the Shoot Out Free Spins feature, where Sheriff badges are locked in place so that the Shoot Out feature applies on every Free Spin.

There are three bounty hunters in the Deadwood Slot. They allow you to win up to 4 Free Spins and appear on reels 2, 3, and 4. When they appear, you must hope they keep coming on every spin. With each appearance of a bounty hunter, the Wild multiplier increases by 1x. If multiple Wild multipliers appear, they are added together for a total Wild multiplier. Wilds substitute for all symbols except the Scatter and Sheriff badge symbols.
 
Beware of the Sheriff badge symbol. When the Sheriff badge symbol appears on both reels 1 and 5 in the base game, the Shoot Out feature is triggered. All low-value symbols on the 3 middle reels will turn into Wild symbols.

The most important symbol is the Scatter. 3 of them appearing simultaneously give you the chance to choose between 2 and 8 Free Spins.
 
Hunter Spins feature: with 8 spins awarded to the hunter, at least 1 Hunter Wild is guaranteed to land on every Free Spin. This triggers the Hunter xNudge Wild feature with multipliers. Sheriff badges can also land with the addition of 1 extra spin to what you already have.
 
Gunslinger Spins feature: with 8 gun spins awarded, this is a more volatile option. You challenge the gunslingers head-on and try to win the unlimited win multiplier that remains for the entire feature. Any landing with a Hunter Wild symbol triggers the unlimited win multiplier. Every landing with the Sheriff badge gives you 1 extra Free Spin every time.
